# *QoL Bar* Job Changer

This is just and update of the original *QoL Bar plugin preset* **skotlex** [shared](https://discord.com/channels/838030043518599228/931979457877639189/1051493831113187348) in the FFXIV/UI modding discord.

I got the missing glowing icons (Pictomancer & Viper) from [this mod](https://www.xivmodarchive.com/modid/112967) at XIV Mod Archive, so all credits for the icons to [JayRau](https://www.xivmodarchive.com/user/1295)

**Installation**

1. Import the [following string](#qol-bar-string) in you QoL Bar plugin.
2. Extract the contents of the [ZIP file](#icons) in this path: `` %APPDATA%/XIVLauncher/pluginConfigs/QoLBar`` 

## QoL Bar String

```

```

## Icons

You can choose between 2 icon styles:

- [Transparent background](../../textures/qol-bar-icons.zip)
- [Black square background](../../textures/qol-bar-icons-background.zip)
